content: this is a mikey original design simply called the crochet easy v bag the repeat pattern is a straight shot up from the base of the bag to the top you then finish off the top to straighten up the edge and turn the bag over to finalize the bottom of the bag the straps are easy simply crochet in a tube format crocheted as a large strip and folded over and single crocheted to form the shape sew to the bag
